subject: Re: [junit] Line Separators Error is getting while testing the Junit TestCases
msgSnippet: Hi Koskela, Thanks for your guidence. I have gone through the xmlunit. Now i cleared the error. Thanks& Regards, Thanuja ... From: Lasse Koskela
messageBody:
Hi Koskela,

Thanks for your guidence. I have gone through the xmlunit. Now i cleared the error.

Thanks& Regards,
Thanuja


----- Original Message ----
From: Lasse Koskela <lasse.koskela@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2007 5:12:06 PM
Subject: Re: [junit] Line Separators Error is getting while testing the Junit TestCases

Hi Thanuja,

On 5/17/07, p_thanuja82 <p_thanuja82@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> I am getting line separators error in my test cases.We are
> using axis,hibernate and junit.In this project I am passing 2 xml data
> as strings and I am testing assertEquals( ).In this I am getting error
> as everything is correct only lineseparators. please help me in
> avoiding this error.

You should probably look into a JUnit extension called XMLUnit:

http://xmlunit. sourceforge. net

Lasse

--
Lasse Koskela
